explanations.reason: The paper focuses on the vulnerability evolution and spatial-temporal heterogeneity in rural social-ecological systems in arid regions, specifically using a case study of Minqin Oasis in China. The methodologies mentioned include GIS, stepwise regression, and geographically weighted regression, which are statistical and spatial analysis techniques rather than machine learning or deep learning methods. None of the provided keywords related to machine learning, neural networks, or large language models are mentioned or implied in the title or abstract.
